content:
The agenda for the meeting (everything FHIR-related that I'm aware of) is here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Agenda_201701_WGM
If there are updates, feel free to make them yourself or make a post here so we can update.
REMINDER! The Java and .NET users meeting will take place at the Hyatt's Q Kitchen (just behind the bar) at 19:30. Grab a beer and join us!

Warriors game party 7 pm @ Augie's Alamo City BBQ Steakhouse - come by #HL7WGM
https://www.yelp.com/biz/augies-alamo-city-bbq-steakhouse-san-antonio-2
